tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE big_data_platforms (
    platform_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform_name VARCHAR(50),
    hadoop_support BOOL,
    spark_version VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE integration_hadoop_spark (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE hadoop_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_name VARCHAR(50),
    data_value INT,
    data_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE spark_analytics (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    worker_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE sql_bigdata_integration (
    job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Integration (
    integration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform_id INT,
    db_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES BigDataPlatforms(platform_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (db_id) REFERENCES SQLDatabases(db_id)
);

CREATE TABLE HadoopTables (
    table_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    table_schema VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    db_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (db_id) REFERENCES SQLDatabases(db_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SparkTables (
    table_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    table_schema VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    db_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (db_id) REFERENCES SQLDatabases(db_id)
);
